CustomField.description: DEPRECATED - The stack size of the static logger in a Salesforce Function. This represents the number of messages that the logger will store before dropping the oldest log message when a new one is recorded.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: DEPRECATED - The stack size of the static logger in a Salesforce Function. This represents the number of messages that the logger will store before dropping the oldest log message when a new one is recorded.
CustomField.label: DEPRECATED - Functions Log Size
